# Interactive graph

<style>
  * {
    font-family: sans-serif;
  }
  body {
    font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
    margin: 20px;
  }
  h1 {
    color: #333;
  }
  .question {
    margin-bottom: 20px;
  }
  .question label {
    font-size: 18px;
    font-weight: bold;
  }
  input[type="number"], select {
    padding: 5px;
    width: 200px;
  }
  button {
    padding: 10px 20px;
    background-color: #4CAF50;
    color: white;
    border: none;
    cursor: pointer;
    font-size: 16px;
  }
  button:hover {
    background-color: #45a049;
  }
  .result {
    margin-top: 20px;
    font-size: 20px;
  }
  #line-chart {
    margin-top: 40px;
    width: 100%;
    height: 400px;
  }
</style>
<body>
  <div id="plot">
      <h1>US Government Quiz</h1>
      <div class="quiz-container">
          <div class="question">
              <label for="party-senate">1. Which party has the most members in Senate right now?</label>
              <select id="party-senate"></select>
          </div>
          <div class="question">
              <label for="party-congress">2. Which party has the most members in Congress right now?</label>
              <select id="party-congress"></select>
          </div>
          <div class="question">
              <label for="senator-term">3. How many years are there in one full term of a US Senator?</label>
              <input type="number" id="senator-term" placeholder="Answer in number">
          </div>
          <div class="question">
              <label for="least-spent">4. On which program does the Federal Government spend the least?</label>
              <select id="least-spent"></select>
          </div>
          <div class="question">
              <label for="geer-case">5. When did the Supreme Court decide on Geer v. Connecticut?</label>
              <input type="number" id="geer-case" placeholder="Answer in number">
          </div>
          <div class="question">
              <label for="party-select">What is your party affiliation? (Republicans or Democrats)</label>
              <select id="party-senate"></select>
          </div>
          <button id="submit-btn">Submit Answers</button>
          <div class="result" id="result"></div>
      </div>
      <div id="line-chart"></div>
  </div>

  <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/d3@7"></script>
  <script src="scripts/myscript.js"></script>
</body>
